pages.text: The Thunderguard is a curio created by striking a $(l:glass_shield)Glass Shield$(/l) with lightning. This is easiest to do using a Channeling trident and Copper Rod. While equipped, lightning damage is converted into a movement and attack speed buff, with a duration based on the damage of the attack.
Additionally, enemies which attack the wearer take lightning damage, and the wearer can use the effects of the Channeling enchantment without the need for thundering weather.

The Thunderguard supports the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Curse of Chromatic Twisting$(): Melee attacks cause the target to be struck by lightning during thundering weather, if the target is exposed to the sky. Removes lightning immunity.
